ca.ualberta.cs.w18t11.whoselineisitanyway.controller

Class DataSourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.w18t11.whoselineisitanyway.controller.DataSourceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSource

    public final class DataSourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSource
    Manages offline and online data synchronization.
    Version:
    3.1
    Author:
    Brad Ofrim, Samuel Dolha, Mark Griffith
